title: ZestMate (an AI chatbot)
des: ZestMate is an AI chatbot. I create this AI for an assistant at my university name ZHSUST. This AI can answer all the questions about my university like an assistant. Let's Talk With ZestMate!

title: Tailwind CSS Components
des: Those CSS components are mainly created for developers. So that they can complete their project quickly by copy and passing a tailwind component.
